title: Drawing, 1862
medium: Graphite on cream-colored wove paper, mounted in album
inscribed:
In graphite across soldier, at center: The extra ration
numbered at top in graphite: (145)
in pen and brown ink (upside down) at bottom of page(columns of numbers adding up to 500): 200 / 125/ 100/ 50 / 25/ 500.
creditline: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
description: Slight vertical sketch of a soldier, at center; undecipherable scrawl, at lower left,;  a sum, written upside down, at bottom of page.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, 1862.
1862. Graphite on cream-colored wove paper, mounted in album. Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.. 1912-12-145-b.
